text: Juan Martín del Potro was the defending champion, but chose not to compete this year, after a wrist operation in May and only starting to practice again in August. Rafael Nadal defeated Novak Djokovic 6–4, 5–7, 6–4, 6–2 to win his first US Open title. It was his ninth career major and Nadal completed the Career Golden Slam with the win. Nadal became the first player since Rod Laver in 1969 to win the French Open, Wimbledon, and the US Open all in the same calendar year. ==Seeds== # Rafael Nadal (Champion) # Roger Federer (Semifinals) # Novak Djokovic (Final) # Andy Murray (Third Round) # Robin Söderling (Quarterfinals) # Nikolay Davydenko (Second Round) # Tomáš Berdych (First Round) # Fernando Verdasco (Quarterfinals) # Andy Roddick (Second Round) # David Ferrer (Fourth Round) # Marin Čilić (Second Round) # Mikhail Youzhny (Semifinals) # Jürgen Melzer (Fourth Round) # Nicolás Almagro (Third Round) # Ivan Ljubičić (First Round) # Marcos Baghdatis (First Round) 17.
